title: 7 from Mass. charged in alleged kidnapping and torture plot
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Five of the alleged kidnappers are in custody, and two remain at large.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Five Massachusetts men were charged in an alleged gang-related kidnapping and torture conspiracy, while two suspects remain at large.

title: Golden retriever puppies with potentially deadly virus found abandoned in Boston
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News One of the dogs, named Big Red, will be up for adoption once the virus and gastrointestinal parasites clear his system.
Big Red during his hospitalization.
MSPCA-Angell MSPCA-Angell is advising owners to vaccinate their dogs after golden retriever puppies with a potentially deadly disease were found abandoned in Boston.

title: Plane stops takeoff at Logan Airport after shooting flames, smoke
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News A plane stopped its takeoff at Boston Logan Airport Tuesday evening after flames and smoke spurted from the back of the aircraft, a video captured by Boston25 News shows.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A plane stopped its takeoff at Boston Logan International Airport Tuesday afternoon after flames and smoke spurted from the back of the aircraft, a video captured by Boston25 News shows.
